item.title: 102, BJV 102L, Daimler Fleetline CRG 6LX, Roe Body (H45-29D), 1973 (t.1983)
item.description:
Andy Reeve-Smith posted a photo:

Grimsby, Cleethorpes Transport, no 102, BJV 102L, a Daimler Fleetline with handsome Roe H45-29D Body, dating from 1973.

A photo taken from my bedroom window in Scartho, in 1983.

This was the first real proper overall advertisement on a GCT double-decker, and it caused quite a stir, locally. A sensational job, and I was really most impressed. It was a shame but it only ran like this for a year or so, being repainted into the caramel and cream standard livery in mid-late 1984.

Another excellent runner, after its active life with GCT, no.102 ended up in Manchester, in service for a number of years with 'Pennine Blue'; looking very smart in their lovely livery.
item.author: nobody@flickr.com (Andy Reeve-Smith)
item.media:title: 102, BJV 102L, Daimler Fleetline CRG 6LX, Roe Body (H45-29D), 1973 (t.1983)
item.media:description:
Grimsby, Cleethorpes Transport, no 102, BJV 102L, a Daimler Fleetline with handsome Roe H45-29D Body, dating from 1973.

A photo taken from my bedroom window in Scartho, in 1983.

This was the first real proper overall advertisement on a GCT double-decker, and it caused quite a stir, locally. A sensational job, and I was really most impressed. It was a shame but it only ran like this for a year or so, being repainted into the caramel and cream standard livery in mid-late 1984.

Another excellent runner, after its active life with GCT, no.102 ended up in Manchester, in service for a number of years with 'Pennine Blue'; looking very smart in their lovely livery.

item.title: Irish Memorial.- George Best in Belfast, County Down, Northern Ireland.
item.description:
mrvisk posted a photo:

- This Mural of George was unveiled on his would have been 60th birthday .. 2005 .. and wearing his Northern Ireland Team Kit .. its situated in The Cregagh Estate in Belfast where George was born and brought up, his family home is just around the corner. i took this image days after it was unveiled and i think in perfect condition {not weather beaten} .. this picture of the memorial can no longer be taken as within a short period of display there was railings erected around the mural and in front of it they have built bungalows,, not allowing you the angle to get a full or good shot of it .. George was one of the greatest footballers of all time and he was from our wee country Northern Ireland - 4 -
item.author: nobody@flickr.com (mrvisk)
item.media:title: Irish Memorial.- George Best in Belfast, County Down, Northern Ireland.
item.media:description: - This Mural of George was unveiled on his would have been 60th birthday .. 2005 .. and wearing his Northern Ireland Team Kit .. its situated in The Cregagh Estate in Belfast where George was born and brought up, his family home is just around the corner. i took this image days after it was unveiled and i think in perfect condition {not weather beaten} .. this picture of the memorial can no longer be taken as within a short period of display there was railings erected around the mural and in front of it they have built bungalows,, not allowing you the angle to get a full or good shot of it .. George was one of the greatest footballers of all time and he was from our wee country Northern Ireland - 4 -

item.title: ET-AVC
item.description:
Ian R. Simpson posted a photo:

An early morning view of activity at Manchester Airport [MAN} on January 22nd, 2026 as Etihad Airways Boeing 777 A6-ETE is seen on stand prior to working 08:25 EY78 to Abu Dhabi [AUH] whilst in the foreground Ethiopian Airways Airbus A350 ET-AVC draws on stand having operated ET726 from Addis Ababa [ADD] (00:05) via Marseille [MRS] (05:20-06:20).
item.author: nobody@flickr.com (Ian R. Simpson)
item.media:title: ET-AVC
